  17. exception Memory_overflow


  20. (* Representation of automata *)


  23. ‌type automata =
  24.     Perform of int * tag_action list
  25.   | Shift of automata_trans * (automata_move * memory_action list) array
  26. ‌and automata_trans =
  27.     No_remember
  28.   | Remember of int * tag_action list
  29. ‌and automata_move =
  30.     Backtrack
  31.   | Goto of int
  32. ‌and memory_action =
  33.   | Copy of int * int
  34.   | Set of int

  36. ‌and tag_action = SetTag of int * int | EraseTag of int

  38. ‌type ident = string *  Syntax.location

  40. (* Representation of entry points *)
  41. ‌type tag_base = Start | End | Mem of int
  42. ‌type tag_addr = Sum of (tag_base * int)
  43. ‌type ident_info =
  44.   | Ident_string of bool * tag_addr * tag_addr
  45.   | Ident_char of bool * tag_addr

  47. ‌type t_env = (ident * ident_info) list

  49. ‌type ('args,'action) automata_entry =
  50.   { auto_name: string;
  51.     auto_args: 'args ;
  52.     auto_mem_size : int ;
  53.     auto_initial_state: int * memory_action list ;
  54.     auto_actions: (int * t_env * 'action) list }

  56. (* The entry point *)

  58. ‌val make_dfa :
  59.   ('args, 'action) Syntax.entry list ->
  60.   ('args, 'action) automata_entry list * automata array
